author: Suthir Shanmugasundaram
comment: Doesn't display any information. Location just says "city" and temperature is 00° and it's always fog. You have to pay to get to settings, but there isn't any options really, so why bother? It's does look good though.
title: Useless

author: Melanie E Magdalena
comment: This looked awesome until I tried it on Moto 360 2nd gen. The display is cut off and is not nearly as elegant as the promo images. Maybe I'll try it again in the future. Uninstalled.
title: Display cut off

author: Joseph C
comment: Love it, helps me a ton in geometry. Great interface :p
title: Amazing app

author: Russell Hanson
comment: Lame
title: It doesn't actually do rotary motion

author: Russell Houde
comment: You need to pay for anything beyond basic functions. No thanks
title: Meh

author: Fernando Viñan-Cano
comment: First test I do on any calculator app is 16÷3*3, should be 16, this calculator gives 15.99 - fail! Android calculator gets it right.
title: Sorry, fails simple calculation

author: Matthew Talia
comment: Would be good to have a percentage button. I know I can work it out without it, but it would be good if it had it.
title: Missing percentage?

author: Ivan Mosley
comment: Awesome app. The ui is great for any round face wear device. However, I would like to see the option to speed up or disable the animations all together for faster calculations.
title: Good

author: Araam Zaremehrjardi
comment: I bought the app and on my LG G Watch and when I push the green button to switch to it, it does not want to work and yes I push restore purchase many times and I can't directly activate Advance mode on the watch. So I'm going to leave 3 starts till its fixed.
title: Advance Mode Trouble

author: Bryan Haugen
comment: Really nice to use on a smart watch compared to other wear calculators. Wish using an operation was quicker to input. Less or faster animation or swipe to the desired operation instead of 2 taps.
title: Really like how easy it is to use

author: Francisco Perez jr
comment: It doesn't display correctly. it would had been a nice app.
title: Sony smartwatch 3

author: Saul V
comment: Great calculator however where is the most basic function...percentages?
title: Love the idea

author: Nicolas Ducom
comment: I have tried almost all of the Moto 360 calculator apps and this one is by far the most ergonomic and beautiful one!
title: Best Moto 360 calculator

author: Sean Decker
comment: Rather than squish a normal layout on a round face this app rethinks the layout and it works
title: A design that works

author: eric biscayne
comment: Had to buy it 2 use it
title: Booo!

author: Vern Cowles
comment: This is useful for the mathematically challenged like myself!
title: Cool

author: John Roppelt
comment: Too many free calculators out there.
title: Not worth it.

author: Efthimios Floros
comment: Better than most other calcs for moto 360

author: Edward Peters
comment: The easiest and, IMO, easiest calculator to use with the moto360

author: Josh Parsons
comment: Works and functions great

author: Dennis Bareis
title: Can't get much better for such a small space, very well done.

author: Tarandeep Singh
comment: brilliantly well thought design.
title: Absolutely love it

author: Matthew Whelpton
comment: Beautiful and functional. Great job of rethinking the design for a round screen.
title: Beautiful on the Moto 360

author: Mark G
comment: Looks really nice, and very intuitive to use.  Needs a % symbol though? Maybe the mode changer can have three dials? The new one offering a few new functions, memory store/add/clear etc?
title: Moto 360

author: Lil Red
comment: World's good
title: Cool
